3: Everything's just not going to plan...

2: Why don't we lay out all the cards on the table?
Don't just stick to your hand.

3: ...Staessen, where did you find this young 'un?
This is the Gray Raven Commandant. We were finally able to bring closure to Derek and Amberia thanks to this person.
Why didn't you say so! Have a seat! Bring me a glass of the best kvass!
First of all, the Commune wants a secure place to live. The two icebreakers are our only hope of survival. However, they also limit our population.
The Forest Guards are willing to accept absolution and move to a new settlement, provided that the interests of others are not harmed.
Wait... We might have something on our hands here!
So, if the Forest Guards are willing to clear safe passage for a land-based supply route, the Commune can sail the ships to New Murmansk without worries.
Once we resupply at New Murmansk, the Commune and Forest Guards will set out toward the new settlement.
And with a new transportation line established, the ARU can also establish contact with you. The new environment will be far more hospitable than where you live now!
...Looks like we were too focused on ourselves.
If that's the case, we'd be more than willing.
The Forest Guards are also willing to comply with this operation.
